Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Any type of abortion, induced or spontaneous, that is associated with infection of the UTERUS and its appendages. It is characterized by FEVER, uterine tenderness, and foul discharge.
